Text:
This is a "must-have" in every movie collection!!!

The Reaping is a fantastic and intensive thriller, which is not only starring Hillary Swank (Million Dollar Baby, Boys Don't Cry and my favourite Freedom Writers) - the most fantastic female-actress - but also AnnaSophia Robb (Charlie and The Chocolate Factory and Bridge to Terabithia)- one of the hottest names in Hollywood!

I PROMISE you, that you will not regret downloading this movie..
